ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard Training in Kunark
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Think about it, the fastest way to do this would be a Wizard (with JBoots) porting to West Karana, or maybe a druid porting from North Karana considering
ygData.messageBody:
> Tszaaz wrote:
> > There is a run from the Dreadlands to Qeynos! *grin* sure, I
> > only got 2 gold
> > for it, but the mail must go through!
>
> Ohfercripesake!! Freeport to Kelethin gave me more than that!
>
> Maybe it was 8 gold or so but they were concerned that teleporting classes
> could use the quest to get rich quick?

Think about it, the fastest way to do this would be a Wizard (with JBoots)
porting to West Karana, or maybe a druid porting from North Karana
considering high level SoW or Scale of Wolf sould toast JBoots. Even at that
it's several minutes for 8gold and faction, I imagine not a lot of mail will
be flowing along that route.

Hey, has anyone done speed tests against Scale of Wolf? I had some fun the
other day racing a 26 druid friend from G Fay zone to Kaladim, he cheated
and used Spirit of Cheeta and I still nearly caught him. I'm going for a
rematch when I get a MM battledrum

Reedwind
16th level bard
